医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
宫颈动脉解剖住院的种族和年龄差异颈动脉解剖是颈部动脉的撕裂，可为大脑提供血液。这样的撕裂会导致血块引起中风。一项新的研究发现，在15年内，美国宫颈动脉解剖的住院数量将近五倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/racial-and-age-disparities-in-cervical-artery-artery-dissection-hospitalizations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/racial-and-age-disparities-in-cervical-artery-artery-dissection-hospitalizations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f39d8ad9-55b5-4aa5-4aa5-8712-ae333e51f4a4 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 02:18:46 -0400 Racial and age disparities in cervical artery dissection hospitalizations
癌症药物设计的新结构和机械理解爱荷华大学领导的一项研究揭示了DNA修复蛋白RAD52所采用的意外结构，因为它结合并保护了分裂细胞中的复制DNA。对RAD52-DNA复合物的新结构和机械理解可以帮助研究人员开发新的抗癌药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-structural-and-mechanistic-mechanistic-underding-for-cancer-drug-design.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-structural-and-mechanistic-mechanistic-mechanisting-for-for-cancer-drug-design.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96361f0a-e29a-46dd-b86a-145a31280894 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 02:10:22 -0400 New structural and mechanistic understanding for cancer drug design
与欧洲相比，财富不平等驱动美国死亡率更高研究人员将美国的财富和生存率与欧洲的财富率与欧洲的人进行了比较，在十年的时间里，所有财富水平的美国人比欧洲同行更有可能死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/wealth-inequality-inequality-inequality-drives-higher-us-us-mortality-compary-compared-compared-to-europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/wealth-inequality-inequality-inequality-drives-higher-us-us-mortality-compary-compared-compared-to-europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=179f3368-1EC3-4F5B-A427-227E087C38F6 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 01:58:43 -0400 Wealth inequality drives higher US mortality compared to Europe
遗传研究为患有罕见肠道疾病的儿童提供了希望进一步的基因检测将表明，索菲（Sophie）具有一组罕见疾病，称为代码（先天性腹泻和肠病），会破坏细胞在肠道中的功能，导致腹泻，并防止婴儿吸收他们成长和繁殖所需的营养素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/genetic-research-creach-forers-hope-for-children-with-rare-intestinal-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/genetic-creachearch-crearch-forers-hope-for-children-with-rare-intestinal-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4df108ED-8021-4445-A283-9F16A136B330 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 01:47:57 -0400 Genetic research offers hope for children with rare intestinal disorders
新研究强调了更广泛的健康益处在肥胖症护理中的重要性将在今年欧洲肥胖大会（ECO 2025，马拉加，西班牙马拉加，5月11日至14日）上进行的新研究表明，针对特定％减肥的体重减轻计划通常会失败，应考虑其他因素，包括改善与肥胖相关的并发症，增强生活质量的质量和整体身体和社会功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-research-underscores-the-importance-the-importance-of-barader-health-benefits-in-benefits-in-benefits-in-obesity-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-research-underscores-the-mimportance-the-importance-of-broader-health-benefits-in-benefits-in-obesity-care-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=472ffa30-aa3c-46AA-81A3-40950AF18D3B Thu, 03 Apr 2025 01:40:38 -0400 New research underscores the importance of broader health benefits in obesity care
稀有阿尔茨海默氏症形式的视觉功能障碍的神经病理学基础UCL研究人员的一项新研究发现，大脑中某些蛋白质和标志物分布的分布差异可以解释为什么有些人首先会经历视力变化而不是阿尔茨海默氏病的记忆力丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/neuropatholopation-basis-basis-of-visual-dysfunction-in-rare-alzheimers-forms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/neuropatholopation-basis-basis-of-visual-dysfunction-in-rare-alzheimers-forms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cee9dde-280f-4Ceb-863c-863c-2aa51fb94923 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 01:35:45 -0400 Neuropathological basis of visual dysfunction in rare Alzheimer's forms
美国的医疗保健负担能力危机达到了新的高潮根据最新的West Health-Hall-Gallup Healthcare Professia Index，无法获得美国的新高，有超过三分之一的美国人（35％）或估计有9100万人的人获得了新的高位，报告说，如果他们今天需要，他们将无法获得优质的医疗保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/healthcare-affordability-crisis-crisis-in-the-us-reaches-a-new-high.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/healthcare-affordability-crisis-crisis-in-the-the-us-reaches-a-new-high.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2d8f8bc-fe33-4C8B-9C47-C47-CDE3A5E9CDF0 Wed, 02 Apr 2025 23:59:02 -0400 Healthcare affordability crisis in the U.S. reaches a new high

西北科学家开发了快速HIV测试以进行护理点诊断跨越学科的西北大学科学家团队开发了新技术，这可能会导致在一小部分时间内与传统的基于实验室的HIV测试竞争的艾滋病毒感染快速测试，而无需在临床实验室中处理或确认结果，而不需要紧张的等待。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/northwestern-scientists-develop-rapid-rapid-hiv-hiv-test-for-point-point-point-point-point-point-of-care-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/northwestern-scientists-develop-rapid-rapid-hiv-hiv-test-hiv-test-for-point-point-point of-care-care-diacnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=185FAFC7-9E33-4063-967C-DD9AF7ABC53C Wed, 02 Apr 2025 23:53:14 -0400 Northwestern scientists develop rapid HIV test for point-of-care diagnosis
